Sentencas: We have explored the effects of lanthanum oxide (La2O3) on the properties of barium-free SrO-CaO-ZnO-B2O3-SiO2 glass system varying its content from 0 to 6 mol%.
Titulo: Effects of lanthanum oxide on the properties of barium-free alkaline-earth borosilicate sealant glass

Sentencas: The coefficient of thermal expansion and glass transition temperature of the glasses are found to be in the ranges 10.6-10.8 x 10(-6)/K (50-600 degrees C) and 650-690 degrees C respectively.
Titulo: Effects of lanthanum oxide on the properties of barium-free alkaline-earth borosilicate sealant glass

Sentencas: Differential scanning calorimetric studies revealed an increase in crystallization peak temperature and thermal stability of the glasses up to 4 mol% and then decrease on further addition.
Titulo: Effects of lanthanum oxide on the properties of barium-free alkaline-earth borosilicate sealant glass

Sentencas: A monotonic increase in characteristic shrinkage temperature of glass powder compact is observed on addition of La2O3 as revealed in the heating stage microscopic study.
Titulo: Effects of lanthanum oxide on the properties of barium-free alkaline-earth borosilicate sealant glass

Sentencas: X-ray diffraction studies revealed reduced crystallization peak intensity in La2O3 added glasses.
Titulo: Effects of lanthanum oxide on the properties of barium-free alkaline-earth borosilicate sealant glass

Sentencas: Fourier transformed infrared spectra disclosed that the addition of La2O3 stabilized the glass structure by reducing the number of non-bridging oxygens.
Titulo: Effects of lanthanum oxide on the properties of barium-free alkaline-earth borosilicate sealant glass

Sentencas: Vickers micro hardness of the glasses varied in the range 2.6-5.6 GPa.
Titulo: Effects of lanthanum oxide on the properties of barium-free alkaline-earth borosilicate sealant glass

Sentencas: Scanning electron microscopy revealed the formation of particulate nature of microstructures in parent glass which is not observed in the La2O3 added glasses.
Titulo: Effects of lanthanum oxide on the properties of barium-free alkaline-earth borosilicate sealant glass

Sentencas: Activation energy of crystallization has increased from 331 to 361 kJ/mol determined by Kissinger and Augis-Bennett models.
Titulo: Effects of lanthanum oxide on the properties of barium-free alkaline-earth borosilicate sealant glass

Sentencas: Above properties of these glasses clearly advocate their applicability as solid oxide fuel cell sealants.
Titulo: Effects of lanthanum oxide on the properties of barium-free alkaline-earth borosilicate sealant glass
Effects of lanthanum oxide on the properties of barium-free alkaline-earth borosilicate sealant glass
